{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WNDR3700 |revision=v3 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |fcc_date=07/08/2011 |fcc_id=PY311200166 |ic_id=4054A-11200166 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4718A1 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6445E |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6JB-25 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4718A1 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4331 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53115 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |tp_firmware=FreshTomato |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=74:44:01, 84:1B:5E |oui_eth=74:44:01, 84:1B:5E }} {{TagLine|N600 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=WNDR3700v3|vs_id=19278}}
Manuf. by [[Foxconn]] (''Hon Hai/Ambit'')
The device appears to be a neutered (non-3x3:3 5GHz band) WNDR4000. :The switch is assumed to be the BCM53115.
The default SSIDs may be '''NETGEAR''' (2.4GHz) and '''NETGEAR-5G''' (5GHz).
*[http://git.chromium.org/gitweb/?p=chromiumos/third_party/autotest.git;a=blob;f=server/cros/chaos_static_ap_list.conf;h=96ffe88e6ec025cb32eabb71d13ca12b0b0feb39;hb=dcaefdda36ec9e3c281d70ccabb2ec900efce1a7 84:1B:5E OUI]
